name: Alignment
descr: Choose one of the pronunciation variants of a phonetization and performs the time-alignment of such phonemes to the related audio, and also the tokens if available. Requires the Phonetization grammar, and optionally the Normalized text. Produces time-aligned phonemes and optionally time-aligned tokens.

options.text: Pattern of the file with the phonetization
Pattern of the optional file with the normalized text
Pattern of the output file with time-aligned phonemes and tokens
Speech automatic aligner system. Can be: julius, hvite, basic
Perform basic alignment if the aligner fails
